message: Let's split the funds with a 3:1 ratio. This offers a fair compromise considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
A slight improvement from my end, considering the inflation rate.
Considering the inflation rates and previous offers, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while offering a better deal than the last round for both of us.
I'm willing to meet in the middle, but I think I can do better than that.
